[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1458808517945{padding-right: 1.5% !important;padding-bottom: 1.5% !important;padding-left: 1.5% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”qodef-hide-portfolio”][vc_column]

Brand Home

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” content_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1456408759880{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”3383″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1456415940425{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

Suprema is fully compatible with the free, easy to use, and immensely powerful WooCommerce plugin for eCommerce. Launch your shop right now.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”90px”][vc_single_image image=”3384″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1456417347199{padding-top: 6.5% !important;padding-bottom: 6.5% !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″]

new
[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7″]
shop features
[vc_empty_space height=”18px”][vc_column_text]

Discover the power of Suprema. Packed with tons of practical features, Suprema lets you create the shop you’ve always wanted.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” content_aligment=”center”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3391″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

User Account

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Let your clients create their own accounts, keep track of their favorite products, track their orders, and so much more with the user account functionality in Suprema.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3392″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Awesome Menu Styles

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Choose between standard dropdown and mega menu styles for your menu. Easily add banners, selected products, and widgets into the mega menu.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3393″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Variable Products

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Easily create variable products to let clients choose different colors, sizes, models, and more. Define your own variable attributes and customize your products.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” content_aligment=”center”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3403″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Optional Top Header

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Enable the beautifully designed top header with the click of a button. The top header provides additional room for menus, widgets, social icons, search forms and more.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3404″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Wishlist Functionality

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Suprema is fully compatible with the YITH WooCommerce Wishlist plugin, providing the functionality for your clients to create product wishlists.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3405″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Single Product Types

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Choose from a variety of single product types, including grouped, virtual, and affiliate products. Choose the perfect product type for your eCommerce needs.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” content_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1456416430379{padding-bottom: 55px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3406″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Order Tracking

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Let your clients track all their ordered products via the WooCommerce order tracking form shortcode which can easily be implemented anywhere on your website.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3407″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Multiple Shop List Styles

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Choose from an expansive collection of distinct shop list styles and hover types. Easily customize your online shop and make it uniquely awesome.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_single_image image=”3408″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”36px”][vc_column_text]

Creative Product Presentations

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text]Besides standard shop layouts, Suprema also includes a collection of creative presentational and marketing layouts for showcasing your top products.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”55px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1456416515120{padding-top: 5.5% !important;padding-bottom: 5.5% !important;background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″]

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7″]
Our themes are
[vc_empty_space height=”12px”]
fully responsive
[vc_empty_space height=”18px”][vc_column_text]

All themes by Select are fully responsive and retina ready. Make sure your shop looks amazing on all devices with Suprema.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”parallax” content_width=”grid” content_aligment=”center” full_screen_section_height=”no” parallax_background_image=”3375″ css=”.vc_custom_1456416844127{padding-top: 12% !important;padding-bottom: 13% !important;}”][vc_column]
Don’t Wait. Buy Now.
[vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1456416917154{padding-right: 15% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;}”]Beautifully designed, powerful, and easy to customize – Suprema is the shop theme you’ve been waiting for.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Buy The Theme View Home Pages [/vc_column][/vc_row]
